name: Portfolio website
description: This website is an fullstack Astro js application using React components. TypeScript used in the components and Tailwind CSS  for styling. Website designed using Figma

name: Workout logger
description: Fullstack application for keeping track of gym exercises. I created Node.js, Express backend RESTFUL API for retrieving data from the MongoDB batabase. I also created the login and register in the frontend side of the project which used React and MaterialUI.
technologies: React, Node, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, MaterialUI

name: AI assisted content creator
description: Project course fullstack application done for the company Bytecraft. Tool to help the use of AI models (GPT-3) in written game asset creation. Team project where I have focused on the frontend side of the project. React + TypeScript with Material Design. (Website currently not available for public)

name: E-commerce site mockup
description: E-commerce site mockup for Device-Agnostic design course. Focus on the device-agnostic design, i.e., designed for many different sizes of screens. Mock screens for viewing, purchasing, filtering products and setting personal information to the application. Created using Flutter. Checkout the website from below:
